name: BCAN
description: BCAN specializes in fitness trampolines designed for home exercise, offering foldable and easy-to-store models that cater to various fitness levels. Their products emphasize durability, safety, and user-friendly design, making them suitable for both adults and children.

products.name: BCAN 40" Foldable Mini Trampoline
products.description: A 40-inch foldable mini trampoline with a light green arch leg design, supporting up to 450 lbs. Features 36 built-in automatic training programs and is easy to fold and store.

products.name: BCAN 48" Foldable Mini Trampoline
products.description: A 48-inch foldable fitness rebounder with an adjustable foam handle, supporting up to 440 lbs. Ideal for both adults and children seeking a full-body workout.

products.name: BCAN 36" Kids Trampoline
products.description: A 36-inch trampoline designed specifically for children, featuring a safety handlebar and a sturdy frame to ensure a safe and fun jumping experience.

customer_reviews.name: Beth J.
customer_reviews.comment: After the first week of using this, I am feeling more in shape already. My 80-year-old hubby is using it too.

customer_reviews.name: A. Whoever
customer_reviews.comment: It's quiet and has a perfect bounce. I can really get into it. 100% recommend.

customer_reviews.name: Dr. S
customer_reviews.comment: It's the right size, with plenty of space for jumping around. I'm glad I got the bar but you don't have to use it if you're not as clumsy as I am.

promotions.title: Fast & Free Shipping
promotions.details: Fast and free shipping from local warehouses. 30-day money-back guarantee and lifetime official tech-support.
